description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
**National Capital Region (NCR) Temporary Staffing Services**
==============================================

**Notice Details:**
-----------------

*   Noticed Title: NPP – S5028692 – Temporary Help Services (THS SA)
*   Notice Reference: cb-690-69788908
*   Notice Amendment: 1
*   Date of Notice: July 11, 2024

**Procurement Details:**
-----------------------

*   Procurement Title: Temporary Help Services (THS)
*   Notice Type: RFP (Request for Proposal) against a Supply Arrangement
*   Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective tendering
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Contract Details:**
-------------------

*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

**Specifications and Requirements:**
--------------------------------

*   The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services
*   The services are required for Top Secret level resources
*   The services are open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following stream and category: 13.9 Special Advisor

**Invitation to Tender:**
-------------------------

*   The following Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
    • 9149481 Canada Inc.
    • Akkodis Canada Inc.
    • AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
    • ... (and other suppliers)
*   Interested suppliers must submit their proposal electronically through the Canada Buys platform

**Important Dates:**
-------------------

*   July 18, 2024, 11:30 AM (EST) – Tender Closing Date
*   July 18, 2024 – Amendment Date

**Documentation:**
-----------------

*   Tender Notice Document: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42030/s5028692-rfp-for-competitive-method-1-lowest-price_0.pdf)

Note: Please seek advice from the contracting authority or suppliers if you require more information about the above-mentioned documents. The details provided in this document are meant for information purposes only.
